title: lanasharine
author: lanasharine
content: Multiply your investment by at least 3 and become a millionaire in a few months.Yes it is possible with our project! You help us make the project known by investing in advertising and in return you can obtain significant gains.We are only looking for 1-2 people for a starting investment of 10 ethereum.This announcement is very serious and could allow you to make a very good investment.Contact me by message to know the project and the details.

comments.author: lijingang
comments.body: I'm curious what gives you the confidence to make such untrustworthy promises

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Thats the biggest Shit Announcement i readed so far in 2023 !Not really any Information about your so awesome and great ProjectNo Webpage or any Link to look whats your Project aboutWith all this missed Information it dosnt looks like an very serious Announcement and ProjectQuote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 02:02:25 PMMultiply your investment by at least 3 and become a millionaire in a few months.Bullshit , if this would be possible why you dont have released it for now and invested yourself into it and got a millionaire ?Quote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 02:02:25 PMWe are only looking for 1-2 people for a starting investment of 10 ethereum.Sounds and looks like an Scam , as mentioned earlier 10 ETH dosnt get you a millionaire in some Month.Watch out here , possible Scam attempt !

comments.author: lanasharine
comments.body: I understand your reactions because there are so many scammers on the internet and even more in the world of cryptocurrency.In order to avoid displaying the project everywhere, I only communicate the address of the project by message.I am part of this fully decentralized project and there is no scam. Some big things are being built but the project needs 1-2 investors.I will explain everything to you by message.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 04:08:26 PMI understand your reactions because there are so many scammers on the internet and even more in the world of cryptocurrency.In order to avoid displaying the project everywhere, I only communicate the address of the project by message.I am part of this fully decentralized project and there is no scam. Some big things are being built but the project needs 1-2 investors.I will explain everything to you by message.Lets go and send me a message with your Project and all details for it !Provide me some links and maybe where i can take some look for my self what you have in the back and in your hands.I will make some review and for sure i give my opinion about it.Feel free to send me a PM with your things , i waiting.

comments.author: lanasharine
comments.body: Reminder for those interested:- initial investment of 10 ethereum- only two investors sought.- return on investment which can be multiplied by 3 at least.- commitment to the project that can make you a millionaire.Is this investment safe?The project has the potential to become a success, but like any investment there is always a risk.contact me for more information

comments.author: sillvestters
comments.body: The project has the potential to become a success, but like any investment there is always a risk.contact me for more information WinkA risk of losing 10 ETH.

comments.author: lanasharine
comments.body: The world needs people who invest. In business there is always a risk, but the project is incredible and the risk remains limited.

comments.author: EmpoEX
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 08:34:45 PMThe world needs people who invest. In business there is always a risk, but the project is incredible and the risk remains limited.You did not submit anything as proof that you have business and people can trust you. You are a newbie and you do not have a reputation or anything in this forum. No one would take the risk to lose their 10 ETH. Â There is no reason for someone to trust a complete stranger and invest around $10K. This is a bad scam attempt. Do something different

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 08:34:45 PMThe world needs people who invest. In business there is always a risk, but the project is incredible and the risk remains limited.Thats not true , the world needs not people who invest there money that others can possible make them a better life or scam them.We need some projects that have good intentions and looking good.And from the links you sended me in the pm for your project i have to say there is nothing special as from others.Would be a waste of time and Money in my opinion.

comments.author: CryptoGrizzly
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 26, 2023, 08:34:45 PMThe world needs people who invest. In business there is always a risk, but the project is incredible and the risk remains limited.It seems like your project is a 100% risk. Who in their right mind will invest 10 ETH for your unknown project.Best of luck scamming people.

comments.author: lanasharine
comments.body: Thank you all for participating in our request.The investors has been found.And don't forget that you have to help innovative projects.

comments.author: CryptoGrizzly
comments.body: Quote from: lanasharine on June 27, 2023, 08:19:02 PMThe investors has been found.I seriously doubt it. Have them post here that they are investing.

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on June 28, 2023, 12:29:14 PMI seriously doubt it. Have them post here that they are investing.I seriously doubt that also that there some seriously Investors have be found.And i hope when its true that there somebody made this investing that they write here at some stage and give some Feedback about it.Also if that , that what the OP has written with getting rich fast was coming or that they got scammed maybe.
